customPropertySet._instruction: Add any user-defined parameters grouped in context-specific sets that are not covered in the standardized properties of this activity.

description._instruction: Enter a description of this activity.

endTime._instruction: Enter the date and/or time on when this activity ended, formatted as either '2023-02-07T16:00:00+00:00' (date-time) or '16:00:00+00:00' (time).

input._instruction: Add all inputs used by this activity.

lookupLabel._instruction: Enter a lookup label for this activity that may help you to find this instance more easily.

output._instruction: Add all outputs generated by this activity.

performedBy._instruction: Add all agents that performed this activity.

startTime._instruction: Enter the date and/or time on when this activity started, formatted as either '2023-02-07T16:00:00+00:00' (date-time) or '16:00:00+00:00' (time).

studyTarget._instruction: Add all study targets of this activity.
